name: coioioin
description:
In coioioin you flip a lot of coins. Try to land on the same side as many times in a row as possible. Can you manage to land on the edge? Is it pure luck or is it skill? Find out now!

Get your name on the online leaderboard and unlock several different and new environments to play in!

Since saving is dependant on cookies, all backgrounds are unlocked by default. For the full experience, the game can be downloaded on android devices:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.BooleanTrue.coioioin

Known issues:

When playing on mobile, no name can be put into the leaderboard since the mobile keyboard doesn't show.
